Storyline:
It is a couple of years in the future... The highways of Australia are ruled by violent gangs who have turned the highways into a
battleground as they loot gasoline and terrorize the innocent.
Max Rockatansky is a policeman who had everything... Until, a murderous motorcycle gang led by the
evil Toecutter burns his partner Jim Goose to death and murders his wife and son, after Max killed their leader "The Knight Rider".
Loosing his rocker, Max decides to take the law into his own hands as he sets out to get his revenge on the motorcycle gang
and become the road warrior known as "Mad Max".
